results.t: Unicorn: What It Means in Investing, With Examples
results.p: A unicorn refers to a privately held startup company with a valuation exceeding $1 billion. These companies, often found in technology and other sectors.

results.t: Unicorn - Simple English Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
results.p: A unicorn is a legendary and mythical creature. It looks like a pony with one long, single and white horn on its head. The word unicorn means "one-horned".
While many mythic creatures are man-eating monsters or evil spirits, others, like unicorns, are powerful and peaceful.

results.p: UNICORN meaning: 1. an imaginary white creature like a horse with a single horn growing from the front of its head…. Learn more.
